Content.name: Jamie Pollock
Content.bodyText:
Great read, Darren. I'd be interested in seeing the code is it going open source at any point. Would love to contribute.

Did you ever consider adding controllers based on node type alias? When looking into this myself I lifted some logic from Matt Brailsford's Karbon it's one of the features I really like from Umbraco core and I'll admit that's where I got stuck when trying to create this kind of a solution, you really have to detach any logic away from UmbracoCms.Core entirely.
